about_the_game:
A kit containing Medic Miguel, an Epic Outfit for Miguel, 3500 Coins and 7 days of Premium.

  • Medic Miguel from the EZAPAC Collection:

Miguel is armed with a Benelli M4 Super 90 semi-automatic shotgun, which doesn’t just inflict considerable damage to the enemy at close range, but also sets them on fire. His team-supporting gear of choice is an injection gun that can instantly revive a teammate from any distance. His primary ability, Medical Drone, is able to seek out and heal teammates on its own, without distracting the player from the fight.

  • Pyro Epic Outfit for Miguel:

An alternate outfit and a scope for M4 Super 90 primary weapon.

  • 3500 Coins:

Coins can be spent on operators, customization items, progress boosting.

  • 7 days of Premium:

Premium speeds up in-game progress and unlocks Premium objectives.

— +20% XP if all teammates have active Premium.

— +10% XP for all teammates.

— +100% XP in all types of combat.

— +30% XP in the new Battle Pass.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, Cruelty or Gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960+ / AMD HD 7xxx+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
